text:
When i list some directory in the web server (http:.../movies/), the big files
size is wrong:
the original size: 
ls -l /var/www/movies/VAN_HALEN1-1.vob
-rw-r--r--  1 root root 4373581824 2004-12-08 21:13 /var/www/movies/VAN_HALEN1-1.vob
And the listed size in the browser:
VAN_HALEN1-1.vob        08-Dec-2004 21:13  75.0M  

The server:
Debian-Sarge
Linux musculus 2.6.8-1-386 #1 Thu Nov 11 12:18:43 EST 2004 i686 GNU/Linux
apache: 1.3.33-2


Thanks!
